short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop Shopify Admin Screens Having Tiny Max-Width!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase the size of those frustratingly small Shopify Admin stores by installing a simple, single background CSS rule to take advantage of higher resolution screens.
